use_theme_fonts=”yes”][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”48″ md_spacing=”30″ sm_spacing=”20″ xs_spacing=”20″][vc_column_text]

Crypterio is ICO and Cryptocurrency WordPress theme, that perfectly fits for any type of crypto-consulting project. With Crypterio theme you’ll get a powerful solution for an ICO Landing Page or Cryptocurrency Consulting business website.

Crypterio is ready for a Smart Contract and an ICO Whitelist Pre-Signup integration through CSV/XML compatible standard to manage token distribution. Just integrate your Smart Contract with a Whitelist through CSV/XML to manage token distribution.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

  • ICO Launching Countdown
  • ICO Whitelist Pre-Signup
  • Smart Contract Integration

[/vc_column_text][stm_spacing][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

  • Exchange Rates Widgets
  • Cryptocurrency Converter
  • ICO Listing / Database

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”70″ md_spacing=”70″ sm_spacing=”50″ xs_spacing=”40″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1533188651401{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;border-top-color: #e8e8e8 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #e8e8e8 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn”][stm_image_carousel grayscale=”yes” img_size=”full” autoplay=”yes” items=”5″ images=”4336,4340,4339,4338,4337″ custom_links=”#,#,#,#,#”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” el_id=”how_it_works”][vc_column][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”138″ md_spacing=”120″ sm_spacing=”80″ xs_spacing=”60″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading icon_pos=”bottom” stripe_pos=”bottom” text=”Protecting Investors` Interests” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:42px|text_align:left|line_height:48px” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”50″ md_spacing=”40″ sm_spacing=”30″ xs_spacing=”30″][vc_column_text]

While we are helping start-ups to raise the funds, we care about investors whose investments’ protection we wish to guarantee to the maximum extent. The voting system gives the investors bigger control over their investment.

If an investor is not content with the progress and the results of a given milestone, the dissatisfaction may be expressed after every milestone during the voting process. If the majority of the investors have voted yes, the escrow, enforced by a smart contract, will allow the use of the funds allocated for the next milestone.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”32″ md_spacing=”30″ sm_spacing=”20″ xs_spacing=”20″][vc_single_image image=”4190″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css_animation=”fadeInRight”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”98″ md_spacing=”80″ sm_spacing=”60″ xs_spacing=”60″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” el_id=”cost-calculator”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_custom_heading icon_pos=”bottom” stripe_pos=”bottom” text=”Crypto Mining Calculator” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:42px|text_align:center|line_height:48px” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”50″ md_spacing=”40″ sm_spacing=”30″ xs_spacing=”30″][stm_crypto_calculator calc_id=”4461″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”4191″ img_size=”full” css_animation=”fadeInLeft”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”100″ md_spacing=”80″ sm_spacing=”60″ xs_spacing=”60″][vc_custom_heading icon_pos=”bottom” stripe_pos=”bottom” text=”We Bring together Marketplaces & Finance” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:42px|text_align:left|line_height:48px” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”50″ md_spacing=”40″ sm_spacing=”30″ xs_spacing=”30″][vc_column_text]

The ultimate goal of STMX is to be the all-in-one solution and offer a wide array of services from market to finance.

Our clients — both corporate and private ones — will access all the services they need from a single platform. Blockchain technology gives us the chance to make your finances grow faster and give better returns.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row
